item.title: UK Blockchain Projects Near Regulatory Approval - CoinDesk
item.description:
UK Blockchain Projects Near Regulatory Approval - CoinDesk

UK regulators are reportedly moving forward with efforts that would find blockchain firms exiting a sandbox program aimed at encouraging innovation. According to a report by The Financial Times , the UK Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) is currently considering whether to approve several blockchain-based products for use by domestic consumers and businesses.

item.title: BlockPay Pre-ICO Will Go Live Tomorrow
item.description:
BlockPay Pre-ICO Will Go Live Tomorrow

Disclaimer: The Merkle does not endorse the BlockPay team, their project, or any services coming forth from this concept. Always invest at your own risk. Not too long ago, we touched upon the BlockPay company, which wants to bring cryptocurrency to the commerce sector.

item.title: Japanese Banks Plan Blockchain Forex Services
item.description:
Japanese Banks Plan Blockchain Forex Services

A new consortium of Japanese banking and financial services giants will seek to use blockchain technology to provide domestic and foreig n exchange services. Japanese financial services giant SBI Holdings and its subsidiary SBI Ripple Asia, have collaborated to launch a consortium that will seek to use blockchain innovation - the technology underpinning bitcoin - in new payment and settlement services from October 2016.

item.title: Major Chinese Exchange CHBTC CEO: Chinese Government Giving Positive Signals with Digital Currencies
item.description:
Major Chinese Exchange CHBTC CEO: Chinese Government Giving Positive Signals with Digital Currencies

In an extended interview with CCN to be published soon, Dawei Lee, Chief Executive of CHBTC, China's biggest ETH and ETC trading exchange and fourth by volume for BTC, stated: Recently the government in China has been giving positive signals in regards to digital currency and blockchain technology.

item.title: KYC-Chain is The Only Blockchain Finalist In The 2016 Fintech Innovation Lab Asia-Pacific
item.description:
KYC-Chain is The Only Blockchain Finalist In The 2016 Fintech Innovation Lab Asia-Pacific

The 2016 Fintech Innovation Lab Asia-Pacific organisers have revealed the names of the eight qualifying startups. For this year, the focus was on blockchain technology, fraud prevention, and wealth management, among other financial services. Surprisingly enough, only one blockchain startup made it to the finals. Then again, one is better than none.

item.title: Bitfinex to Offer Company Equity to Reimburse Customer Losses - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitfinex to Offer Company Equity to Reimburse Customer Losses - CoinDesk

Bitfinex customers may soon have a way to convert the digital assets they were issued following the exchange's decision to socialize losses into equity in the company. Weeks after a debilitating hack , Bitfinex has signed a letter of intent with UK investment platform BnkToTheFuture that finds the two firms collaborating to enable the redemption of BFX tokens for equity in iFinex Inc, its British Virgin Islands-based parent company.

item.title: EthTrade Offers 25% Monthly Income on Ethereum Investments
item.description:
EthTrade Offers 25% Monthly Income on Ethereum Investments

A financial management company has promised to offer up to 25% monthly returns on Ethereum investments. A financial management company has promised to offer up to 25% monthly returns on Ethereum investments. EthTrade, as the company is titled, is touted as one of the first Ethereum-based investment projects that exclusively operate with currency pairs Ether/BTC and Ether/USD.

item.title: Protecting Bitcoin, Blockchained Ukraine, Utopia or Inevitability. Cryptospace News digest, July 25 - 31
item.description:
Protecting Bitcoin, Blockchained Ukraine, Utopia or Inevitability. Cryptospace News digest, July 25 - 31

This week has passed without any disasters, giving the community a break, though some believe it's a lull before the storm. Anyways, it's interesting to recall the events that built it. By the end of the week, Bitcoin managed to gain some value, and currently it is traded at around $584.

item.title: What are some amazing facts about Bitcoin?
item.description:
What are some amazing facts about Bitcoin?

Answer (1 of 2): One of the coolest things about Bitcoin is its origin story and the mystery surrounding Satoshi Nakamoto. To this day, it's still unknown who actually wrote the original Bitcoin whitepaper and developed the initial implementation. Some speculate that it was a group of people all ...

item.title: Trees Joins Growing Alt-Payments Industry for Medical Marijuana
item.description:
Trees Joins Growing Alt-Payments Industry for Medical Marijuana

Bitcoin-accepting Trees, a former medical cannabis dispensary that made headlines with its vision to deliver dank buds via drone, has pivoted towards becoming a marketplace in conjunction with building a payment processor. Its emphasis is on allowing cannabis businesses to become their own banks through blockchain technology.
